Posts.Content: Nov 12, 2017 08:59AM A4ggy wrote: I am in the midst of chemo right now for stage 2A TNBC. I have finished 4 rounds of AC and starting 4 dense dose Taxol. I am planning on a bilateral mastectomy with immediate reconstruction, but I already worry about follow up appts and making sure they can check appropriately. Fear of recurring is real and I wonder how I will move on with life and not be in constant worry mode.
Posts.Title: Monitoring for recurrence - what do your doctors suggest? mellee gb2115
